title: Healing
creator_credit: Judith Odgers and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Judith is teaching in Thailand as a young teacher. It is an extraordinary cultural experience and also life changing as Judith is diagnosed with HIV. This story delves into the psyche of a young woman coming to terms with the taboos and limitations of the virus she has contracted.
